page.title: 05MY SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday I go to my Nanna's in Broomhill and I take a Bible because I like to write it out.While I am there I have a game of elastics.This is where you get 2 chairs and put some elastic round the legs.This forms an oblong which I can jump in and out of or jump onto.My Nanna gives me 20 pence to go to the shop.I buy 4 sticks of spanish and 8 bubblies. Then I go to my other Nanna's in Pontefract where I see my cousins.They begin to fight and I have to be the referee.My Auntie Brenda comes out and tells them to pack it in or she will send them home.Afterwards my Nanna makes us a drink of tea before we go home. When I get home I go and watch television and then I go to bed.
